name: The Foxy Thief
description:
The Foxy Thief
Control the red fox and get all the objectives, be smart and don't get caught!
You can transform yourself into other animals to hide yourself.

Good luck!

This project is done for the Spring #UE4Jam 2018
Special thanks to freesoung.org for the audio samples
All the assets i used can be found on the Unreal Engine Marketplace
